work.name: Bosch Center for Artificial Intelligence (BCAI), Renningen
work.summary: Topic: Neural Contractive Robot Learning With Full-Body Obstacle Avoidance on Riemannian Manifolds. New obstacle avoidance based on learned implicit robot surfaces and grasped objects. Design of a novel generative flow model for a contraction preserving diffeomorphism

work.name: Bosch Center for Artificial Intelligence (BCAI), Renningen
work.summary: Learning from Demonstration based on Riemannian manifolds. Development of ROS interfaces for learning and executing robot skills

work.name: Desoltik, Karlsruhe
work.summary: Research & development of a robot- and AI-driven desoldering system for a circular electronics industry. Exhibitor and presenter at SAP sapphire (Orlando & Barcelona) 2024, SPS (Nürnberg) 2023, BW Summit 2024. Sensor fusion of a heat array using ML and system dynamics. Development of a cascaded control loop following temperature profiles based on non-linear models. Implementation of industrial robot arms for removal of semiconductors.
highlights: Circular industry, Control Engineering, Machine Learning, International Fairs

work.name: FZI Research Center for Information Technology, Karlsruhe
work.summary: Research & development of a robot- and AI-driven desoldering system for a circular electronics industry. Exhibitor and presenter at SAP sapphire (Orlando & Barcelona) 2024, SPS (Nürnberg) 2023, BW Summit 2024. Sensor fusion of a heat array using ML and system dynamics. Development of a cascaded control loop following temperature profiles based on non-linear models. Implementation of industrial robot arms for removal of semiconductors.

work.name: Robert Bosch Power Tools GmbH, Leinfelden-Echterdingen
work.summary: Construction and prototyping of mechanical assemblies. Support in the development of 4+ new devices.

volunteer.summary: Modeling of a free-floating electromagnetic system. Design of nonlinear control strategies for 6 DOF levitation. Research & development of a state estimation using a Kalman filter and state dynamics by combining 14 sensors. Design of a control parameter optimization based on a Particle Swarm Algorithm and a Genetic Algorithm.
highlights: Levitation Control, Optimization, System Modeling, State Estimation

teaching.summary: Holding workshops and theoretical assistance on levitation control and system modelling. Reviewing of technical concepts and development. Planning further research direction.
Mechanical Design IV – workshop supervision (hybrid drivetrain).

awards.title: Best Product Award
awards.summary: 6 professors and 6 experts from the industry evaluate the product, which has been worked on from the idea to the realization within one year. The technical development as well as the entrepreneurial idea are evaluated.
